title: Rethinking Godly Sexuality in Your Marriage (Part 1 of 2)
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Juli Slattery
itunes:summary:
Dr. Juli Slattery recognizes that many couples a poor foundation for understanding God’s design for intimacy — that our sexual relationship is a metaphor for the intimacy God longs to have with each one of us. (Part 1 of 2)

Receive the book "God, Sex and Your Marriage" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-07-14?refcd=1439706&treatment=one-time-gift
